Paper & card recycling: Black wheelie bin with blue lid or clear sacks | Collected every two weeks

Mixed recycling: Green wheelie bin with blue sacks | Collected every 2 weeks (alternates with paper and card)
Green box with blue sacks | Collected every 2 weeks (alternates with paper and card)

Rubbish: Black bin or red sacks | Collected every two weeks

Food waste recycling (outdoors): Large brown caddy | Collected every week

Recycling batteries: Place in an untied plastic bag on top of your bin

Recycling textiles and shoes: Place in a tied plastic bag on top of your bin

Green wheelie bins | Collected every 2 weeks

Rubbish: Silver metal bin with black lid | Collected every week
